title: Rory McIlroy British Open PGA Championship
headline: Rory McIlroy: 2014 In Pictures
description: Rory McIlroy had an eventful 2014. He got engaged, got unengaged, and then surpassed Tiger Woods as the hottest name in golf by winning two major championships. We recap his year with the best photos from the last 12 months.
page_title: Rory McIlroy British Open PGA Championship
body: Rory McIlroy had an eventful 2014. He got engaged, got unengaged, and then surpassed Tiger Woods as the hottest name in golf by winning two major championships. We recap his year with the best photos from the last 12 months.
